education.brief: Department of Computer Science at National Tsing Hua University

about.title: About Me
about.intro:
Hello! My name is Yun Chien Lo. It's nice to meet you!

From a young age, I've had a strong passion for drawing and design. When I entered university, I enrolled in the Computer Science and Engineering program at Tsinghua University.
about.introBold: I attempted to merge my love for visual arts with my technical training in computer engineering.
about.introTrail:
During my senior year, I discovered my career path as a "frontend engineer."

Having both the soul of an artist and the mind of an engineer, I approach my work with enthusiasm, a desire to create, and a willingness to tackle challenges.

character.title: My personality and traits
character.content: I believe I have a very typical
character.contentTrail: according to the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI):

adventurer.summary: Adventurers are true artists.Driven by curiosity and eager to try new things, people with this personality often have a fascinating array of passions and interests. With their exploratory spirits and their ability to find joy in everyday life, Adventurers can be among the most interesting people you’ll ever meet.
adventurer.prosBold: Charming, Sensitive to Others, Imaginative, Passionate, Curious, Artistic.
adventurer.cons: Possible weaknesses: Fiercely Independent, Unpredictable, Easily Stressed, Overly Competitive, Fluctuating Self-Esteem.
adventurer.link: See more: Career Paths of Adventurer

work.title: Programming Skills in Software Development
work.content:
After graduation, I worked as a frontend developer with two years of experience specializing in web development using Vue.js.

I quickly became a key member of the team,
work.contentBold: actively participating in the planning and development stages of a BPM(Business Process Management) project. I contributed to approximately 70% of the project,
work.contentTrail:
and my technical skills and teamwork abilities grew significantly.

I also provided programming advice and direction to other team members.

team.title: A good team player
team.content: As a team player, I place a strong emphasis on:
list: Pre-planning for the implementation of the methodology
Accurate estimation of effort and time
Clear code logic and meticulous commenting
Proper use of version control and collaborative tools
Effective communication, I prefer using bullet points and visual aids to convey my ideas to colleagues.

logic.title: Programming thinking
logic.content: As a software engineer, I possess the following qualities:
list: Clear logical thinking for designing efficient data structures and algorithms
Proficiency in functional programming and component-based logic for implementing complex UX functionalities
Ability to design project architectures, manage them effectively, and create concise development documentation
Capabilities in assessing feasibility, researching and implementing new features, maintaining and updating existing technologies
Proactive and resourceful approach, proposing solutions and utilizing available resources
Keeping up with technology trends and being enthusiastic about learning and adopting new technologies

future.title: Future plannings
future.content: I am someone who is willing to try new things, embrace challenges, and open to receiving feedback. In a new job, I aspire to push beyond my current technical abilities. Some potential aspects include:
list: Complete mastery and utilization of either React or Angular frontend frameworks
Experience in deployment / compression / packaging / performance optimization methods
Creating visualizations or animations in projects
Involvement in SEO or performance optimization projects
Learning about transmission and information security-related knowledge
Exposure to backend server and database technologies

accumulate.title: Cumulative Experience
accumulate.value: Front-end development engineer 3~4 years,  Software engineer 0~1 year,  Graphic design 3~4 years Multimedia animation designer 0~1 year

skill.title: Skills
webList: Proficient in web fundamentals: HTML5 / CSS3 / Javascript. I am Familiar with ES6 syntax and JSDoc specification, as well as md syntax.
Familiar with SASS / SCSS and BEM conventions.
Skilled in asynchronous processing: RESTful API / axios / Promise (await async concept), and has rich experience in API interface design and integration.

Front-end frameworks: Vue2 / Vue3 / Vite / Vue-cli, familiar with Vue optional and compositional api, Vue lifecycle hook, component decomposition methods, JSX template language, proficient in Vuex / Pinia store usage, familiar with Vue-Router route design and configuration.
UI/UX frameworks: Bootstrap / Element-ui / Element Plus / Vant.
Version control tools: proficient in using git and able to flexibly use git cli commands, familiar with Github development mode, and have experience with Github CI/CD tools.
Other front-end libraries: vue-draggable / SortableJS / lodash / i18n and more.
Other collaboration tools: Trello / Notion / HackMd / Figma / Illustrator / Photoshop and more.
otherList: Clear logical thinking, able to design clear data structures and algorithms.
Able to plan RESTful API interfaces for backend engineers.
Proficient in web development, familiar with RWD and AWD implementation methods.
Skilled in using functional programming concepts and component decomposition logic, and able to plan and implement complex UX features.
Can design and manage large project structures and able to write clear development record documents.
Skilled in cross-departmental communication, serving as the front-end department liaison for product planning units, back-end development units, and QA testing units.
Evaluate development feasibility and research new features and maintain legacy code and update existing technologies.
Proactive, positive, and resourceful in proposing solutions.
